00033 const std::string SMALL_CEL_FILE = "../data/small_cel_file";
00034 const std::string SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_OUTLIER_NO_MASK = "../data/small_cel_file_no_outlier_no_mask";
00035 const std::string SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_STDEV = "../data/small_cel_file_no_stdev";
00036 const std::string LARGE_CEL_FILE = "../data/large_cel_file";
00037 const std::string SMALL_UINT16_CEL_FILE = "../data/small_uint16_cel_file";
00038 
00039 static int32_t intenTestValues[4] = {55683, 4568, 2368, 100};
00040 static float stdevTestValues[4] = {2.345f, 56.23f, 1.53f, 3.875f};

00054         CelFileReader reader;
00055         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00058 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallCelFileNoOutlierNoMaskTest()
00059 {
00060         CelFileData data;
00061         CelFileReader reader;
00062         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_OUTLIER_NO_MASK);
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00064 
00065         // Read some data
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_OUTLIER_NO_MASK);
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetVersion() == 1);
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgorithmName() == L"Feature Extraction");
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 2);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 10);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasStdev() == true);
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasNumPixels() == true);
00075 
00076         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00077         data.GetAlgorithmParameters(params);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetName() == L"percentile");
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetValueFloat() == 0.75f);
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetName() == L"outlierlow");
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetValueFloat() == 1.004f);
00083 
00084         float intensity;
00085         int16_t numPixels;
00086         bool outlier, masked;
00087         float stdev;
00088 
00089         int32_t cells = data.GetNumCells();
00090 
00091         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00092         {
00093                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.GetData(cell, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked));
00094 
00095                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(intensity == 100*cell);
00096                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(stdev == .5*cell);
00097                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(numPixels == 25);
00098 
00099                 // Check the values
00100                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(outlier == false);
00101                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(masked == false);
00102         }
00103 
00104         FloatVector vInten;
00105         FloatVector vStdev;
00106         Int16Vector vPixels;
00107         BoolVector vOutliers;
00108         BoolVector vMasked;
00109 
00110         // Get individual columns
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, cells, vInten));
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, cells, vStdev));
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumPixels(0, cells, vPixels));
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOutliers(0, cells, vOutliers) == false);
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetMasked(0, cells, vMasked) == false);
00116 
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten.size() == 10);
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev.size() == 10);
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels.size() == 10);
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vOutliers.size() == 0);
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vMasked.size() == 0);
00122         
00123         // Check values
00124         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00125         {
00126                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten[cell] == 100*cell);
00127                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev[cell] == .5*cell);
00128                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels[cell] == 25);
00129         }
00130 
00131         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00132         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00133         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00134         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 0);
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 0);
00137 }
00138 
00139 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallCelFileTest()
00140 {
00141         CelFileData data;
00142         CelFileReader reader;
00143         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_CEL_FILE);
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00145 
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == SMALL_CEL_FILE);
00147         CheckSmallCelFileHeader(data);
00148 
00149         float intensity;
00150         int16_t numPixels;
00151         bool outlier, masked;
00152         float stdev;
00153 
00154         int32_t cells = data.GetNumCells();
00155 
00156         FloatVector vInten;
00157         FloatVector vStdev;
00158         Int16Vector vPixels;
00159         BoolVector vOutliers;
00160         BoolVector vMasked;
00161 
00162         // Get individual columns
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, cells, vInten));
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, cells, vStdev));
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumPixels(0, cells, vPixels));
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOutliers(0, cells, vOutliers));
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetMasked(0, cells, vMasked));
00168 
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten.size() == 25);
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev.size() == 25);
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels.size() == 25);
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vOutliers.size() == 25);
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vMasked.size() == 25);
00174 
00175         
00176         // Check values
00177         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00178         {
00179                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten[cell] == 100*cell);
00180                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev[cell] == .5*cell);
00181                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels[cell] == 25);
00182                 CheckOutlier(cell, vOutliers[cell]);
00183                 CheckMasked(cell, vMasked[cell]);
00184         }
00185 
00186         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00187         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00188         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00189         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 3);
00192 
00193         // Change the order of operations in the test
00194         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00195         {
00196                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.GetData(cell, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked));
00197 
00198                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(intensity == 100*cell);
00199                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(stdev == .5*cell);
00200                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(numPixels == 25);
00201 
00202                 CheckOutlier(cell, outlier);
00203                 CheckMasked(cell, masked);
00204         }
00205 }

00207 void CelFileReaderTest::CheckSmallCelFileHeader(CelFileData& data)
00208 {
00209         // Read some data
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetVersion() == 1);
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00212         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgorithmName() == L"Feature Extraction");
00213         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 5);
00214         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00215         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 25);
00216         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasStdev() == true);
00217         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasNumPixels() == true);
00218 
00219         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00220         data.GetAlgorithmParameters(params);
00221         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00222         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetName() == L"percentile");
00223         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetValueFloat() == 0.75f);
00224         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetName() == L"outlierlow");
00225         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetValueFloat() == 1.004f);
00226 }

00228 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallCelFileNoStdevTest()
00229 {
00230         CelFileData data;
00231         CelFileReader reader;
00232         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_STDEV);
00233         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00234 
00235         // Read some data
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == SMALL_CEL_FILE_NO_STDEV);
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetVersion() == 1);
00238         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"Hg-small");
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgorithmName() == L"Feature Extraction");
00240         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 5);
00241         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == 5);
00242         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == 25);
00243         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasStdev() == false);
00244         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasNumPixels() == true);
00245 
00246         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params;
00247         data.GetAlgorithmParameters(params);
00248         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 2);
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetName() == L"percentile");
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(0).GetValueFloat() == 0.75f);
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetName() == L"outlierlow");
00252         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.at(1).GetValueFloat() == 1.004f);
00253 
00254         float intensity;
00255         int16_t numPixels;
00256         bool outlier, masked;
00257         float stdev;
00258 
00259         int32_t cells = data.GetNumCells();
00260 
00261         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00262         {
00263                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.GetData(cell, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked));
00264 
00265                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(intensity == 100*cell);
00266                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(stdev == 0);
00267                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(numPixels == 25);
00268 
00269                 CheckOutlier(cell, outlier);
00270                 CheckMasked(cell, masked);
00271         }
00272 
00273         FloatVector vInten;
00274         FloatVector vStdev;
00275         Int16Vector vPixels;
00276         BoolVector vOutliers;
00277         BoolVector vMasked;
00278 
00279         // Get individual columns
00280         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, cells, vInten));
00281         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, cells, vStdev) == false);
00282         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumPixels(0, cells, vPixels));
00283         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOutliers(0, cells, vOutliers));
00284         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetMasked(0, cells, vMasked));
00285         
00286         // Check values
00287         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00288         {
00289                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten[cell] == 100*cell);
00290                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels[cell] == 25);
00291 
00292                 CheckOutlier(cell, vOutliers[cell]);
00293                 CheckMasked(cell, vMasked[cell]);
00294         }
00295 
00296         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00297         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00298         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00299         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00300         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00301         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 3);
00302 }

00304 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadLargeCelFileCheckHeaderTest()
00305 {
00306         CelFileData data;
00307         CelFileReader reader;
00308         reader.SetFilename(LARGE_CEL_FILE);
00309         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00310 
00311         const int32_t cols = 2560;
00312         const int32_t rows = 2560;
00313         const int32_t expectedCells = rows*cols;
00314 
00315         // Read some data
00316         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == LARGE_CEL_FILE);
00317         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == rows);
00318         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetCols() == cols);
00319         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumCells() == expectedCells);
00320         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasStdev() == true);
00321         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.HasNumPixels() == true);
00322 }
00323 
00324 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadLargeCelFileSingleDataAccessTest()
00325 {
00326         CelFileData data;
00327         CelFileReader reader;
00328         reader.SetFilename(LARGE_CEL_FILE);
00329         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00330 
00331         const int32_t cols = 2560;
00332         const int32_t rows = 2560;
00333         //const int32_t expectedCells = rows*cols;
00334 
00335         // Declare buffers
00336         float* intensities = new float[cols];
00337         int32_t* expectedIntensities = new int32_t[cols];
00338         float* stdev = new float[cols];
00339         float* expectedStdev = new float[cols];
00340         int16_t* numPixels = new int16_t[cols];
00341         int16_t* expectedNumPixels = new int16_t[cols];
00342         bool outlier, masked;
00343 
00344         // This is slow. Spot check
00345         for (int32_t row = 0, cell = 0, testIdx = 0;
00346                          row < rows;
00347                          row+=100, cell+=(100*cols) )
00348         {
00349                 for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col, ++cell, ++testIdx)
00350                 {
00351                         // Get the data
00352                         data.GetData(cell, intensities[col], stdev[col], numPixels[col], outlier, masked);
00353 
00354                         // Compute the expected values
00355                         if (testIdx >= 4)
00356                                 testIdx = 0;
00357 
00358                         expectedIntensities[col] = intenTestValues[testIdx];
00359                         expectedStdev[col] = stdevTestValues[testIdx];
00360                         expectedNumPixels[col] = 25;
00361                 }
00362                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(intensities, expectedIntensities, sizeof(int32_t)*cols) == 0);
00363                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(stdev, expectedStdev, sizeof(float)*cols) == 0);
00364                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(numPixels, expectedNumPixels, sizeof(int16_t)*cols) == 0);
00365         }
00366 
00367 
00368         // clean up
00369         delete [] intensities;
00370         delete [] expectedIntensities;
00371         delete [] stdev;
00372         delete [] expectedStdev;
00373         delete [] numPixels;
00374         delete [] expectedNumPixels;
00375 
00376 }

00378 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadLargeCelFileVectorDataAccessTest()
00379 {
00380         CelFileData data;
00381         CelFileReader reader;
00382         reader.SetFilename(LARGE_CEL_FILE);
00383         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00384 
00385         const int32_t cols = 2560;
00386         const int32_t rows = 2560;
00387         //const int32_t expectedCells = rows*cols;
00388 
00389         FloatVector vInten;
00390         FloatVector vStdev;
00391         Int16Vector vPixels;
00392         BoolVector vOutliers;
00393         BoolVector vMasked;
00394 
00395         // This needs to be faster. Spot check
00396         for (int32_t row = 0/*, testIdx = 0*/; row < rows; row+=100)
00397         {
00398                 data.GetIntensities(row*cols, cols*100, vInten);
00399                 data.GetStdev(row*cols, cols*100, vStdev);
00400                 data.GetNumPixels(row*cols, cols*100, vPixels);
00401 
00402                 for (int32_t col = 0, testIdx = 0; col < cols; ++col, ++testIdx)
00403                 {
00404                         // Compute the expected values
00405                         if (testIdx >= 4)
00406                                 testIdx = 0;
00407 
00408                         if (vInten[col] != intenTestValues[testIdx] ||
00409                                         vStdev[col] != stdevTestValues[testIdx] ||
00410                                         vPixels[col] != 25)
00411                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);      // this is slow, only execute it when needed.
00412                 }
00413         }
00414         
00415 
00416 /*
00417         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00418         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00419         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00420         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00421         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00422         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 3);
00423 */
00424 }
00425 
00426 void CelFileReaderTest::CheckOutlier(int32_t cell, bool outlier)
00427 {
00428         if (cell == 0 || cell == 11 /*(1,2)*/)
00429                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(outlier == true);
00430         else
00431                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(outlier == false);
00432 }
00433 
00434 void CelFileReaderTest::CheckMasked(int32_t cell, bool masked)
00435 {
00436         if (cell == 1 /*(1,0)*/ || cell == 7 /*(2,1)*/ || cell == 13/*(3,2)*/)
00437                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(masked == true);
00438         else
00439                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(masked == false);
00440 }

00443 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallCelFileGetOutlierCoordsTest()
00444 {
00445         CelFileData data;
00446         CelFileReader reader;
00447         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_CEL_FILE);
00448         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00449 
00450         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00451         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00452         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00453 }

00468 void CelFileReaderTest::ReadSmallUInt16CelFile()
00469 {
00470         CelFileData data;
00471         CelFileReader reader;
00472         reader.SetFilename(SMALL_UINT16_CEL_FILE);
00473         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00474 
00475         // Read some data
00476         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFileHeader()->GetFilename() == SMALL_UINT16_CEL_FILE);
00477 
00478         CheckSmallCelFileHeader(data);
00479 
00480         float intensity;
00481         int16_t numPixels;
00482         bool outlier, masked;
00483         float stdev;
00484 
00485         int32_t cells = data.GetNumCells();
00486 
00487         FloatVector vInten;
00488         FloatVector vStdev;
00489         Int16Vector vPixels;
00490         BoolVector vOutliers;
00491         BoolVector vMasked;
00492 
00493         // Get individual columns
00494         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetIntensities(0, cells, vInten));
00495         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetStdev(0, cells, vStdev));
00496         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumPixels(0, cells, vPixels));
00497         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetOutliers(0, cells, vOutliers));
00498         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetMasked(0, cells, vMasked));
00499 
00500         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten.size() == 25);
00501         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev.size() == 25);
00502         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels.size() == 25);
00503         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vOutliers.size() == 25);
00504         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vMasked.size() == 25);
00505 
00506         
00507         // Check values
00508         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00509         {
00510                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vInten[cell] == 100*cell);
00511                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vStdev[cell] == .5*cell);
00512                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vPixels[cell] == 25);
00513                 CheckOutlier(cell, vOutliers[cell]);
00514                 CheckMasked(cell, vMasked[cell]);
00515         }
00516 
00517         XYCoordVector xyOutliers;
00518         XYCoordVector xyMasked;
00519         data.GetOutlierCoords(xyOutliers);
00520         data.GetMaskedCoords(xyMasked);
00521         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyOutliers.size() == 2);
00522         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(xyMasked.size() == 3);
00523 
00524         // Change the order of operations in the test
00525         for (int32_t cell = 0; cell < cells; ++cell)
00526         {
00527                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data.GetData(cell, intensity, stdev, numPixels, outlier, masked));
00528 
00529                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(intensity == 100*cell);
00530                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(stdev == .5*cell);
00531                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(numPixels == 25);
00532 
00533                 CheckOutlier(cell, outlier);
00534                 CheckMasked(cell, masked);
00535         }
00536 }
